title: Best product design of 2025
content:
2025 saw hundreds of AI product launches, some of which failed spectacularly, notably: the Humane Pin, a Star Trek-inspired wearable that didn't quite feel like a "Next Generation" wearable; the strangely sycophantic ChatGPT 4.5; and a Grok model that screamed of white genocide.

So, as a reflex against the deluge of gimmicky AI tools, it is perhaps fitting my winner for best product design of 2025 is decidedly *low tech*.

Don't, however, mistake me for an "AI hater"â€”in fact, several *great* AI tools made my "honorable mentions" shortlist for 2025. Before revealing my best product of the year, let's cover three honorable mentions:

## Honorable Mention: Cursor Agent

## Honorable Mention: Coros
